ValidationRule.description: Fund Close Date must be active and associated with the investment vehicle if changed or set
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Investment_Vehicle__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( Investment_Vehicle_Close_Date__c )), Investment_Vehicle__c <> Investment_Vehicle_Close_Date__r.Investment_Vehicle__c, Investment_Vehicle_Close_Date__r.Active__c, OR( ISCHANGED( Investment_Vehicle_Close_Date__c ), ISNEW() ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The fund close date must be active and associated to the investment vehicle related to the opportunity.
